subject: Running
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: "Survivor" meets "Jackass" as participants in the so-called death race in Pittsfield, Vt., go head to head in a grueling 24-hour challenge.
snippet: "Survivor" meets "Jackass" as participants in the so-called death race in Pittsfield, Vt., go head to head in a grueling 24-hour challenge.
